title: What to know about the genocide case against Israel at the ICJ
description: South Africa argues Israel is violating international law by committing and failing to prevent genocide with the intention “to destroy Palestinians in Gaza.”

title: Once-peaceful Ecuador enters a new era: ‘We are in a state of war’
description: The chaos unleashed Tuesday marks a turning point in an escalating security crisis that analysts describe as one of the worst in Latin America in more than a decade.

title: Chinese PLA-linked vessels map the Indian Ocean for submarine warfare
description: Beijing’s growing research activities in international waters are designed to expand undersea military operations, analysts say.

title: U.N. helicopter seized by al-Shabab militant group in Somalia
description: Though the national government has made inroads against the al-Shabab militants, they still control huge swaths of the Horn of Africa nation.

title: Taiwan’s election explained: What’s at stake, and how will China react?
description: Taiwan goes to the polls on Saturday and the result could anger China, whose leader is determined to take control of the island, potentially leading to conflict.

title: Israel-Gaza war live updates: Blinken presses Israel on Gaza’s future; Houthi attack repelled in Red Sea
description: The U.S. secretary of state has encountered resistance in meetings with officials over Israel’s treatment of Palestinians and its post-war plan for Gaza.

title: The Israeli right undermines Biden’s Middle East agenda
description: The Biden administration is trying to thread the trickiest of needles in the Middle East while facing obstacles from within Netanyahu’s far-right coalition.
